author: rovere
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces several key features and improvements to support Phase 2 NGT Scouting and enhanced association handling (useful for `HGCAL`/`TICL` validation and `ML` studies) in NanoAOD.

Adds ability to serialize and store associations across different collections:
* `oneToOne`: `std::vector<AssociationElement<>>`
* `oneToMany`: `std::vector<std::vector<AssociationElement<Kind>>>`

Each `AssociationElement` can hold additional information like:
* `score()`
* `sharedEnergy()`
* `fraction()`

depending on the type.

For further details, please refer to this [talk](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1527714/#7-extension-to-nanoaod-for-ngt).
title: Extend NanoAOD for NGT Phase 2 Scouting and Association Handling
